com.android.volley

接口 RequestQueue.RequestFilter

  • 封闭类:
    RequestQueue

    public static interface RequestQueue.RequestFilter
    A simple predicate or filter interface for Requests, for use by RequestQueue.cancelAll(RequestFilter).

    • 方法概要

      方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
